channel.title: CVE Feed for auth0 -- omniauth-auth0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for auth0 -- omniauth-auth0

item.title: CVE-2020-15240|2024-08-04T13:08:22.896Z -- auth0 -- omniauth-auth0
item.description: omniauth-auth0 (rubygems) versions >= 2.3.0 and < 2.4.1 improperly validate the JWT token signature when using the `jwt_validator.verify` method. Improper validation of the JWT token signature can allow an attacker to bypass authentication and authorization. You are affected by this vulnerability if all of the following conditions apply: 1. You are using `omniauth-auth0`. 2. You are using `JWTValidator.verify` method directly OR you are not authenticating using the SDKâ€™s default Authorization Code Flow. The issue is patched in version 2.4.1.
